content: from lucy s blog 1 the attic24 sweet pea cal will will run for 8 weeks in total beginning on friday 4th january - that ll be the day when the pattern will be published here on my blog and i ll give you all the information you need to get started i ll then give weekly updates every friday throughout january and february 2019 so that we can make the most of weekend hooky time there will be a full picture tutorial here on my blog for the new trellis stripe pattern each week i ll share the colour stripe order for the two different versions of the sweet pea blanket i m making the sweet pea yarn pack 2 contains 15 x 100g balls of stylecraft special dk and is enough to make one blanket/throw there is no printed pattern included in this pack all pattern info will be here on my blog with updates every friday throughout january and february 2019 the sweet pea blanket will measure approx 120cm x 175cm you will need two packs if you wish to make a larger/double bed size blanket i ll give starting chain/pattern guidance for those of you wishing to make larger or smaller blankets sweat pea colours violet ~ cypress ~ candyfloss ~ magenta ~ plum ~ lavender ~ meadow ~ soft peach ~ blush ~ fuchsia purple ~ wisteria ~ pistachio ~ cream ~ clematis ~ pomegranate sweet pea blanket cal part one 3 trellis stripe pattern 4 yardage is based on 15 balls of stylecraft special dk for twin blanket - 30 balls for larger blanket 1 https //www attic24 typepad com/ fbclid=iwar2gjlhixtwtu38tvg0-srtaloeljkvmbe1en0pcpcdghmmyqz1bzwdfq0a 2 https //www woolwarehouse co uk/attic24/attic24-sweet-pea-cal-stylecraft-special-dk 3 https //attic24 typepad com/weblog/2019/01/sweet-pea-blanket-cal-part-1 html 4 https //attic24 typepad com/weblog/trellis-stripe html
